Awards

❖ Top Cited Article Award

Recipients: Roberto Verdecchia, June Sallou, Luís Cruz
Venue: Wiley Interdisciplinary Reviews Journal



❖ Best Paper Award

Recipients: Sofia Migliorini, Roberto Verdecchia, Enrico Vicario, Ivano Malavolta, Patricia Lago, Enrico Vicario
Venue: European Conference on Software Architecture, Luxembourg



❖ Best Presentation Award

Recipients: András Horváth, Marco Paolieri, and Enrico Vicario
Venue: European Performance Engineering Workshop, Venice, Italy



❖ Best Poster Award - Restart Plenary Meeting, Bologna

Recipients: Leonardo Paroli, Marco Becattini, Imad Zaza, Leonardo Scommegna, Giovanni Fontani
Venue: Best Poster awards at Restart Plenary Meeting 2024 - Bologna

❖ Best Paper Award

Recipients: Enrico Vicario, András Horváth, and Marco Paolieri
Venue: 20th International Conference on Quantitative Evaluation of SysTems (QUEST 2023)

❖ Best Reviewer Award

Recipients: Roberto Verdecchia
**Venue: **European Conference on Software Architecture 2022 (ECSA 2022)

❖ Best Paper Award at the Journal of Systems and Software (JSS 2022)

Recipients: Roberto Verdecchia, Philippe Kruchten, Patricia Lago, Ivano Malavolta
Venue: Best Paper Award at the Journal of Systems and Software
Awarded for the project: “Building and evaluating a theory of architectural technical debt in software-intensive systems”

❖ ICPE Best Paper Award

Recipients: Laura Carnevali, Riccardo Reali, Enrico Vicario
Venue: 12th ACM/SPEC International Conference on Performance Engineering (ICPE 2021)
Awarded for the Paper: “Compositional Evaluation of Stochastic Workflows for Response Time Analysis of Composite Web Services”



❖ Facebook Research Award

Recipients: Roberto Verdecchia, Breno Miranda, Antonia Bertolino, Emilio Cruciani
Venue: Facebook Research Call for Proposals on Agent-based User Interaction Simulation to Find and Fix Integrity and Privacy Issues 2021
Awarded for the project: “Testing non-testable programs using association rules”

❖ Best Presentation Award

Recipients: Justus Bogner, Roberto Verdecchia, Ilias Gerostathopoulos
Venue: 4th International Conference on Technical Debt (TechDebt 2021)
Awarded for the Paper: “Characterizing Technical Debt and Antipatterns in AI-Based Systems: A Systematic Mapping Study”



❖ Facebook Testing and Verification Research Award

Recipients: Roberto Verdecchia, Breno Miranda, Emilio Cruciani, Antonia Bertolino
Venue: Facebook Testing and Verification Symposium 2019 (Facebook TAV 2019)
Awarded for the project: “Static Prediction of Test Flakiness”

❖ ACM SIGSOFT Distinguished Paper Award

Recipients: Emilio Cruciani, Breno Miranda, Roberto Verdecchia, Antonia Bertolino
Venue: 41st IEEE/ACM International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE 2019)
Awarded for the Paper: “Scalable Approaches for Test Suite Reduction”



❖ Best Paper Award

Recipients: Patricia Lago, Jia F. Cai, Remco de Boer, Philipe Kruchten, Roberto Verdecchia
Venue: 52th Hawaii International Conference on System Sciences (HICSS 2019)
Awarded for the Paper: “DecidArch: Playing Cards as Software Architects”



❖ ISSIP-IBM-CBA Student Paper Award for Best Industry Studies Paper

Recipients: Patricia Lago, Jia F. Cai, Remco de Boer, Philipe Kruchten, Roberto Verdecchia
Venue: 52th Hawaii International Conference on System Sciences (HICSS 2019)
Awarded for the Paper: “DecidArch: Playing Cards as Software Architects”



❖ Runner-up Best Paper Award

Recipients: Roberto Verdecchia, René A. Saez, Giuseppe Procaccianti, and Patricia Lago
Venue: 5th International Conference on ICT for Sustainability (ICT4S 2018)
Awarded for the paper: “Empirical Evaluation of the Energy Impact of Refactoring Code Smells”
